com.turnout.ws.service

Class StudioActivityServiceImplTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.service.StudioActivityServiceImplTest

  • public class StudioActivityServiceImplTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a testing class for StudioActivityServiceImpl.So here, we mock that class to write test cases and validate generated output are same as expected for given input. All methods are mocking StudioActivityServiceImpl methods and it does not return any value.

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException
        This method to be run before the Test method.So several tests need similar objects created before they can run.
        Throws:
        org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException - It throws when runtime errors happens while testing.

      • testShouldGetListedActivity

        public void testShouldGetListedActivity()
        This test case should test getListedActivity method.This method should get all the active events and challenges from the database.

      • testShouldGetActivityDetails

        public void testShouldGetActivityDetails()
        This test case will test getActivityDetails method. It should get all the details of activity(challenge/event) based on given activity id.

      • testShouldSaveStudioActivity

        public void testShouldSaveStudioActivity()
                                  throws java.text.ParseException
        This test case will test saveStudioActivity method. It should return new or existing activity id of recently changed activity from database when all of its details has been passed as parameter.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - An exception occurs when you fail to parse a Object.

      • testShouldActivitySearch

        public void testShouldActivitySearch()
        This test case will test activitySearch method. It should get all the details of activity(challenge/event) based on given search terms.

      • testShouldActivityDetails

        public void testShouldActivityDetails()
        This test case will test activityDetails method. It should return details of an activity(challenge/event) based on given activity id.
